crud

Class PublicHolidayCRUD<T extends PublicHoliday>

  • java.lang.Object
    • crud.AbstractCRUD<T>
      • crud.PublicHolidayCRUD<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class PublicHolidayCRUD<T extends PublicHoliday>
extends AbstractCRUD<T>
    PublicHolidayCRUD inherits AbstractCRUD whereby attributes from AbstractCRUD is replaced by attributes from PublicHoliday
    Author:
    Ronald
